accessories-decor.Name: AYR - Soy Candle
accessories-decor.Body:
Hand-crafted in North Vancouver, BC. using eco soy wax and essential/fine fragrance oil.  Phthalate and paraben free.  Matte black tin vessel.  Available in four scents that reflect the natural elements of the forests and canyons of North Vancouver.

AYR SCENT - Mandarin, Sea Salt + Cypress

Light and airy, beach house inspired.  Opening notes of Mandarin and Crystal Sea Salt create a sophisticated subtle blend.  Slight notes of Jasmine add a touch of sexy floral.

30 hour burn time

3"DIA x 2"H 

$25

accessories-decor.Body:
Complete with a shaker, jigger, strainer, and spoon that doubles as a muddler, this gold barware set 
includes all the barware basics. It's the perfect gift for anyone looking to learn bartending skills!
  • 4 piece set (includes shaker, spoon, jigger, and strainer)
  • Spoon doubles as muddler
  • Includes all barware basics
  • Great gift!

$70

Available to order on-line, in-store or by phone 604-689-0800.  On-line orders can take up to 2 weeks to arrive.

accessories-decor.Body:
Hand-crafted in North Vancouver, BC. using eco soy wax and essential/fine fragrance oil.  Phthalate and paraben free.  Matte black tin vessel.  Available in four scents that reflect the natural elements of the forests and canyons of North Vancouver.

BELMONT SCENT -  Salt Air + White Woods 

Sea salt, crashing waves and ocean breezes mingle with soft wispy fruits and subtle musk, for an intoxicating walk on the beach.  Notes of Melon essence, Rosewater and Aqua Lotus.

30 hour burn time

3"DIA x 2"H 

$25

accessories-decor.Body:

100% cotton

Handmade in Canada

accessories-decor.Body:

accessories-decor.Name: GLENWOOD  - Soy Candle
accessories-decor.Body:
Hand-crafted in North Vancouver, BC. using eco soy wax and essential/fine fragrance oil.  Phthalate and paraben free.  Matte black tin vessel.  Available in four scents that reflect the natural elements of the forests and canyons of North Vancouver.

GLENWOOD SCENT -  Grapefruit, Cedar + Cardamom

Notes of Pink Peppercorn, Cedar and Cinnamon.  

Notes of Pink Peppercorn, Cedar and Cinnamon.  The balance of Cardamom and Grapefruit create a feeling of warmth and sophistication.

30 hour burn time

3"DIA x 2"H 

$25

accessories-decor.Name: Letter Board
accessories-decor.Body:
Ideal for wordier messages or poignant brevity, this letter board provides adequate real estate for unlimited personalization. This 16" x 20" limited-run letter board is the perfect accent piece for any home or business with its jet-black felt and light oak frame.

Includes 290- piece set of 1" letters and numbers. 

Keep out of reach of children.

Black felt with light oak frame.  Includes hooks for all wall mounting.

16" x 20"

Available to order on-line, in-store or by phone 604-689-0800.  On-line orders can take up to 2 weeks to arrive.

accessories-decor.Name: LODGE  - Soy Candle
accessories-decor.Body:
Hand-crafted in North Vancouver, BC. using eco soy wax and essential/fine fragrance oil.  Phthalate and paraben free.  Matte black tin vessel.  Available in four scents that reflect the natural elements of the forests and canyons of North Vancouver.

LODGE SCENT -   Vanilla, Saffron + Tobacco

Creamy Vanilla, Tobacco; a perfect balance of masculine and feminine.  Sexy and sweet collide to create an exotic blend.

30 hour burn time

3"DIA x 2"H

accessories-decor.Body:

4.50"L x 1.25"W x 5.75"H

bar-cabinets-and-carts.Name: Ada Bar Cart
bar-cabinets-and-carts.Body:
Crafted from metal and finished in a smooth black tone, the Ada is a spectacular rolling cart that is just as functional as it is visually appealing. The Ada flaunts a cylindrical profile and is equipped with two deep, round shelves fitted with railings on the side and mirror glass on the base. In addition to this, the Ada is also equipped with push handles and wheels, which makes it easy to haul drinks around the house when needed.

22 Diameter x 34.5H

$415

bar-cabinets-and-carts.Body:
A stunning arched curio cabinet that is made from sturdy black iron. Fronted by dark, solid mango wood and glass doors that offer both display area and concealed storage. 

48W x 18D x 86H

$4650

bar-cabinets-and-carts.Body:

bar-cabinets-and-carts.Body:
Expertly crafted from antiqued-gold polished metal, the Carola is an unconventional rolling cart featuring a circular chassis that braces two rectangular shelves. The two shelves on the Carola are lined with mirrored-glass for a posh look and the underside of the top shelf sports five slots for stemmed glasses, making them not just visually appealing but also exceptionally functional. The cart is also equipped with four locking caster wheels that allow for seamless movement when needed. The Carola bar cart looks gorgeous in most elegantly styled spaces and is guaranteed to add a touch of panache to them.  

18L x 36W x 40H

$675

Steel structure with “S” shape springs for extra flexibility and strength. This steel frame is molded by an injecting polyurethane foam. Upholstered with a removable leatherette or wool fabric slip cover. The stool is suitable for both residential and commercial use.

frontpage.Body:
The perfect modern stool. Made in Europe. Available as a counter stool or bar stool. Features a chrome base and upholstered seat.  Fabric choices:  leatherette, premium leatherette, standard wool, premium wool and leather.  Appropriate for residential and commercial use.

kermodi-living-art.Name: Kermodi Living Art
kermodi-living-art.Body:
Kermodi Living Art specializes in modern minimalist indoor and outdoor potted plants that provide high design with low maintenance.  The unique, live pieces make fantastic gifts - even for someone without a green thumb! Check out their showroom at Parliament for their ever- changing assortment of living art.   

Prices vary depending on plant type and container.  Start as low as $18!

*** Image for reference only. Exact plant shown may not be available. Please come by the showroom to see the latest selection. ***

living-room.Body:

Add elevated ease to your sitting room or den with this cozy, contemporary design.  Available in 5 fabric options.

26.8" x 25.3 x 28.5H

$1095

living-room.Body:
Casual luxury is the name of the game with our Bowen Series sofas and sectionals. Made to order in BC in the fabric of your choosing. The series comes standard with feather blend cushions for ultimate relaxed coziness. See schematic for available sizes (custom sizes also available upon request).

100" Sofa from $3595

24" diameter x 22"H

$895

living-room.Body:
A smooth, sculptured frame crafted in solid American walnut envelops a padded, finely tailored seat and back.  The Colin II Chair is available in the following materials:

  • Shell (ivory) boucle
  • True blue boucle
  • Palm Springs (mustard) boucle
  • Dark grey wool
  • Dark grey tweed
  • Medium grey tweed

$1450

  • Engineered wood
  • 3 Drawers
  • Soft closing
  • Cable management
  • Solid wood legs

Each piece of marble is expertly crafted out of a unique piece of natural stone, creating beautiful variations and one-of-a-kind details. Available in black or white marble.

Custom sizing available.

living-room.Body:
Inga is a simply designed contemporary occasional chair with a comfortable upholstered seat and backrest on wood base. The perfect design solution for both residential and commercial use. Available in a durable leatherette or wool. Beech frame in a walnut finish.

26.5W x 29.5D x 30H

Premium Leatherette $1315.  Also available in wool - contact us for pricing.

living-room.Name: Function Console
living-room.Body:
Elegant design features a white marble surface paired with black metal frame. 

39W x 14D x 32H

$725

living-room.Name: Bryn Media Stand
living-room.Body:
Our Bryn media stand is designed for multifunction and space saving. With televisions getting thinner and thinner, long gone are the days of the massive TV console centre. Finished in Matte black with black wood drawers and Powder coated black framing, you are sure to meet all of your needs with the Bryn TV stand. The top is finished in smoke glass.  Available in two sizes:

Small 39" X 16" X18"H  $1545

Large 63" X 16" X 18"H  $1985

living-room.Body:

21W x 13D x 19H

$325

living-room.Name: Bryant Media Stand
living-room.Body:
The Bryant Media Stand is the perfect choice for any living room. It features three drawers for storage, a wide shelf for your electronics, and an opening at the back for convenient cable management. It comes in your choice of American walnut , light oak or matte white finish.

Large 59" X 15.5" X 20"H  

$995

living-room.Name: Miriam Media Stand
living-room.Body:
The Miriam Media Stand features a solid wood outer frame and steel legs with bronze lower accents. There are two wicker sliding compartment doors with magnetic door holders to set the doors in place. The media stand features two outer pull out drawers with three shelves for storage. The upper center shelf has a hole cut out to manage wires, perfect for your living room.

Large 71" X 16.5" X 19"H  

$2295

living-room.Body:

47W x 12D x 31.75H 

$2295

living-room.Body:

living-room.Body:

36" diameter x 14" H

$1195

living-room.Body:

33 x 33 x 17H

living-room.Body:

rugs-1.Body:

rugs-1.Body:

Stylish and durable, this retro-inspired collection is equally adored indoors and out for double the fun. Place on a patio for warm-weather fun and bring indoors any time to up the style factor in your living room.

  • UV-resistant
  • Indoor / outdoor
  • Fabric water / fade resistant

Care:

Do not leave in direct sunlight to prevent fading. It requires only a simple wash with solution of cold water and mild soap. Do not use a pressure washer.

  • Indoor/Outdoor

rugs.Name: Basis Rug - Snow
rugs.Body:
Sophisticated and handsomely modern, the Basis takes an elemental accent to a sleek new level. The neutral hue of this hand-loomed double back rug makes for a versatile foundation in bedrooms and living spaces. Crafted of durable wool and soft, lustrous rayon made from bamboo, the cut and looped pile creates a subtle stripe design rich with texture.

5x8 - $1450

*other sizes available, please inquire

rugs.Name: Graphite Rug - Sublime
rugs.Body:
A modern statement for on-trend homes, the Graphite collection brings bold interest and dimension to contemporary interiors. The densely woven polyester and polypropylene blend lends a durable accent to heavily trafficked spaces. The Sublime design features a geometric, tile design in moody hues of gray, cream, and black. The high-low pile provides texture and sheen to bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and entryways

5'3" x 8' - $895

Other sizes available, please inquire.

rugs.Name: Sanaa Tamari Rug
rugs.Body:
Inspired by the African motifs, the Sanaa is the perfect combination of statement-making patterns and easy-to-decorate-with hues. The rug boasts a color-blocked abstract design in tones of black, beige, and taupe with hints of blush. Ivory fringe trim adds texture and vintage allure. This power-loomed rug features a plush and durable blend of polyester and polypropylene, lending the ideal accent to high-traffic spaces.

5' x 7' 6" - $795

other sizes available, please inquire

The easy-to-decorate colorway of cream, light taupe and black beautifully highlights the textural high-low pile. The durable yet soft polypropylene and polyester fibers create a kid and pet friendly accent piece perfect for high and low-traffic areas in any home.



65% Polypropylene 35% Polyester

table-top.Name: Cold-Pressed Olive Oil
table-top.Body:
Many of our family recipes call for just a few simple, quality ingredients – with olive oil being one of the most important. After an exhaustive search for the perfect multi-purpose olive oil, we were delighted to discover this rich and complex Spanish varietal. Sourced from some of the most historic olive trees throughout Spain, Sebastian & Co Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Olive Oil is has intense richness, bright fruit, deep colour and layers of depth.

500 ml 

$24

table-top.Name: Old Barrel-Aged Aceto Balsamico
table-top.Body:
Sebastian & Co’s Barrel-Aged Balsamic Vinegar is from Modena in Italy’s Emilia-Romagna region. It is made with grape must which is simmered, fermented and then matured for 2 years in wood casks. Best used as a drizzle over grilled meats, vegetables, risottos and artisan cheeses, or combined with Sebastian & Co Extra Virgin Olive Oil for a light and lively dip for fresh bread. It can also be used as the base of a clean and classic salad dressing.

500 ml 

$24

table-top.Name: Handcrafted, Expeller-Pressed Grapeseed Oil
table-top.Body:
Sebastian & Co pure French Grapeseed Oil is pressed from the seeds of grapes used in making French wines. The neutral, clean taste, combined with the high smoke point of 420˚, makes grapeseed the go-to oil for searing and sautéing meats, for stir-fries, baked goods and ethnic recipes that demand neutrality in oil. Because of its clean, light taste, it is also great as a base in salad dressings. Grapeseed Oil has the added benefit of being high in Omega 6 and Vitamin E.

500 ml 

$22

wall-decor.Body:
Beautiful images of owls photographed locally and transferred onto a hand-embellished canvases.   View entire collection @ www.heather-johnston.com or visit our store.

12" x 12" x 1.5" - $150 Custom sizes available for special order

 

Heather Johnston's Biography...

"My art is inspired by the beauty of the natural world and the mysteries of life.

My images are a collection of photographs fused together through time and draw from diverse influences. I am inspired by the Surrealists view of the world, one of a compilation of disparate thoughts and dreams and seemingly unrelated images. Historical references include 13th century religious works of Madonnas and Angels and Saints, the Dutch Vanitas paintings, 18th century Botanical illustrations and by the dark searching hand of Goya's paintings and etchings. More contemporary influences include Luis Gonzales Palma."

"Through the image is sustained an awareness of the infinite: the eternal with the finite, the spiritual within matter, the limitless given form... the goal for all art is to explain to the artist himself and to those around him what man lives for, what is the meaning of his existence." -- Andrei Tarkovsky
